name: ”it's a small world”
description: Take a playful boat ride through scenes of singing and dancing dolls from various cultures around the world, promoting unity and harmony.

name: A Pirate's Adventure ~ Treasures of the Seven Seas
description: Embark on an interactive quest as a pirate, using a map to uncover treasures, solve mysteries, and battle enemies throughout Adventureland.

name: Astro Orbiter
description: Climb aboard your own rocket and soar high above Tomorrowland, controlling your spaceship as it spins around a central tower.

name: Be Our Guest Restaurant
description: Step into the magical world of Beauty and the Beast at this enchanting restaurant in Beast's castle, offering French-inspired cuisine and a fairytale setting.

name: Big Thunder Mountain Railroad
description: Board a runaway mine train for a thrilling adventure through the wild west, complete with dips, turns, and breathtaking views.

name: Buzz Lightyear's Space Ranger Spin
description: Join Buzz Lightyear in a battle against the evil Emperor Zurg as you use your laser blaster to shoot targets and rack up points.

name: Casey Jr. Splash 'N' Soak Station
description: A water play area perfect for kids to cool off and have fun, themed after Casey Jr. from the classic Disney film "Dumbo.

name: Casey's Corner Pianist
description: Enjoy the lively tunes of a pianist while dining at Casey's Corner, a hot dog spot on Main Street, U.S.A.

name: Cinderella Castle
description: The iconic centerpiece of Magic Kingdom, Cinderella Castle stands tall as a symbol of Disney magic and serves as a backdrop for nighttime shows.

name: Cinderella Castle: A Beacon of Magic
description: Witness the castle transformed with stunning projections and special lighting effects during nighttime shows.

name: Cinderella's Royal Table
description: Dine like royalty in Cinderella's Castle, meeting Disney princesses and enjoying a fairytale feast.

name: Country Bear Jamboree
description: A classic and humorous stage show featuring a cast of animatronic bears performing musical numbers and jokes.

name: Disney Adventure Friends Cavalcade
description: A lively and colorful parade with beloved Disney characters and adventure-themed floats.

name: Disney Enchantment – Now Through April 2, 2023
description: A nighttime spectacular featuring projections, fireworks, and music celebrating the power of imagination and believing in oneself.

name: Disney Festival of Fantasy Parade
description: Join the celebration as this vibrant parade showcases Disney characters, dazzling floats, and lively music.

name: Dumbo the Flying Elephant
description: Soar high aboard Dumbo's back, controlling your flying elephant to experience a whimsical ride.

name: Enchanted Tales with Belle
description: Step into Belle's world in Maurice's cottage and participate in an interactive storytelling experience with Belle herself.

name: Flag Retreat
description: Be a part of a patriotic ceremony as the American flag is lowered and retired for the day in Town Square.

name: Frontierland Shootin' Arcade
description: Test your marksmanship skills as you take aim at various targets in this old-west shooting gallery.

name: Happily Ever After
description: A spectacular fireworks and projection show that takes guests on a magical journey, celebrating beloved Disney stories and inspiring dreams.

name: Haunted Mansion
description: Take a spooky tour of a haunted estate, filled with ghostly illusions and humorous spirits.

name: Horses - Disney Animals
description: Encounter majestic horses and other animals as they make appearances at Magic Kingdom.

name: Jungle Cruise
description: Set off on a pun-filled expedition through exotic jungles, guided by humorous skippers.

name: Jungle Navigation Co. LTD Skipper Canteen
description: Enjoy a diverse menu inspired by global flavors in this Jungle Cruise-themed restaurant.

name: Let the Magic Begin
description: The daily opening show at Magic Kingdom, welcoming guests with enchanting performances and Disney characters.

name: Liberty Square Riverboat
description: Step aboard the Liberty Belle Riverboat for a relaxing paddlewheel journey along the Rivers of America.

name: Liberty Tree Tavern
description: Savor a colonial-inspired meal in a rustic setting, celebrating American history and traditions.

name: Mad Tea Party
description: Spin and twirl in teacups at this classic Disney attraction, inspired by "Alice in Wonderland.

name: Main Street Philharmonic at Main Street, U.S.A.
description: Enjoy the delightful sounds of a live brass and percussion band as they perform on Main Street, U.S.A.

name: Main Street Vehicles
description: Ride in style on vintage vehicles, such as a horse-drawn trolley or omnibus, along Main Street, U.S.A.

name: Meet Ariel at Her Grotto
description: Meet and take photos with Ariel, the beloved Little Mermaid, in her charming grotto.

name: Meet Cinderella and a Visiting Princess at Princess Fairytale Hall
description: Meet Cinderella and another Disney Princess at this regal meeting location.

name: Meet Daring Disney Pals as Circus Stars at Pete's Silly Sideshow
description: Encounter classic Disney characters dressed as circus performers.

name: Meet Dashing Disney Pals as Circus Stars at Pete's Silly Sideshow
description: Interact with beloved Disney characters in their circus-themed costumes.

name: Meet Mickey at Town Square Theater
description: Meet Mickey Mouse himself at this magical location on Main Street, U.S.A.

name: Meet Princess Tiana and a Visiting Princess at Princess Fairytale Hall
description: Meet Princess Tiana and another Disney Princess in this royal setting.

name: Mickey's Celebration Cavalcade
description: A joyful mini-parade featuring Mickey Mouse and his friends, celebrating the spirit of Magic Kingdom.

name: Mickey's Magical Friendship Faire
description: An enchanting stage show with Mickey and friends, showcasing music, dancing, and special effects.

name: Mickey's PhilharMagic
description: A 3D musical adventure starring Mickey Mouse, featuring iconic Disney songs and classic characters.

name: Monsters Inc. Laugh Floor
description: Be part of a comedy show hosted by Mike Wazowski and his monster friends in Monstropolis.

name: Peter Pan's Flight
description: Soar over London and Never Land on a flying pirate ship, reliving the classic story of Peter Pan.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean
description: Set sail with swashbuckling pirates on a boat ride through pirate-infested waters.

name: Prince Charming Regal Carrousel
description: Ride on a majestic carousel with beautifully decorated horses, fit for royalty.

name: Seven Dwarfs Mine Train
description: Board a mine cart and journey through the diamond mine with the Seven Dwarfs from "Snow White.

name: Space Mountain
description: Embark on a thrilling indoor roller coaster through space, offering high-speed twists and turns in the dark.

name: Splash Mountain
description: Join Br'er Rabbit on a log-flume adventure through scenes from "Song of the South," culminating in a thrilling drop.

name: Swiss Family Treehouse
description: Explore the impressive treehouse built by the Robinson family, offering panoramic views of Adventureland.

name: The Barnstormer
description: A family-friendly roller coaster with the Great Goofini, offering a fun-filled flight through the sky.

name: The Crystal Palace
description: Dine with Winnie the Pooh and friends in this Victorian-themed restaurant with a stunning glass atrium.

name: The Dapper Dans
description: Enjoy the harmonious sounds of this barbershop quartet, performing classic Disney tunes and more.

name: The Diamond Horseshoe
description: A western-style restaurant, offering all-you-can-eat meals and live entertainment.

name: The Hall of Presidents
description: Experience an inspiring show featuring animatronic representations of the U.S. presidents.

name: The Magic Carpets of Aladdin
description: Soar on a magic carpet ride with Aladdin and Abu, controlling the height of your flight.

name: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
description: Join Winnie the Pooh and friends on a whimsical journey through the Hundred Acre Wood.

name: The Plaza Restaurant
description: A charming turn-of-the-century restaurant, serving American comfort food.

name: Tom Sawyer Island
description: Explore an island filled with caves, paths, and places to discover, themed after the adventures of Tom Sawyer.

name: Tomorrowland Speedway
description: Race around a track in your own gas-powered car, reminiscent of the open road and classic speedways.

name: Tomorrowland Transit Authority PeopleMover
description: Take a leisurely tour of Tomorrowland aboard an elevated tram for unique views of attractions.

name: Tony's Town Square Restaurant
description: Dine in an Italian trattoria with Lady and the Tramp theming, offering classic Italian dishes.

name: TRON Lightcycle / Run – New!
description: A high-speed, futuristic roller coaster attraction, inspired by the film "TRON.

name: Under the Sea - Journey of The Little Mermaid
description: Dive under the sea and join Ariel on her adventure, featuring songs and scenes from "The Little Mermaid.

name: Walt Disney World Railroad - Fantasyland
description: Board the classic steam-powered train for a relaxing ride around Magic Kingdom.

name: Walt Disney World Railroad - Frontierland
description: Hop on the train for a scenic journey through Frontierland and beyond.

name: Walt Disney World Railroad - Main Street, U.S.A.
description: All aboard the Walt Disney World Railroad for a nostalgic trip around Magic Kingdom.

name: Walt Disney's Carousel of Progress
description: Step into the past and future in this rotating theater, exploring advancements in technology.

name: Walt Disney's Enchanted Tiki Room
description: Experience an enchanting musical show with animatronic birds, flowers, and tikis in a tropical setting.
